about_the_game:
Craft a leader for others to believe in with Dragon Age™: The Veilguard Character Creator. Delve into robust customization options and create your own unique Rook. When you launch Dragon Age™: The Veilguard, on the same platform (sold separately), you’ll be able to carry over your character and begin your adventure.

Character customization goes beyond appearances. You’ll also select from different races and combat classes as well as choose your character’s backstory.

Character data can be transferred directly into Dragon Age™: The Veilguard on the same platform, which is purchased separately.

This Character Creator is also its own standalone experience. You can create multiple Rooks even if you have not yet purchased Dragon Age: The Veilguard.
